title: I always wanted to be fisted in my ass, but nobody could get their hand in. Is there a trick to it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not so much a trick but rather a technique. Fingers extended to create a conical shape. Thereby allowing a small insertion thats expanding as more of the fingers are introduced, with the whole hand as your goal. The other essential is lubrication designed for just this task. (A strong drink wouldn't hurt either) Definitely not for beginners and takes practice and patience. The “community” of those in the know are extremely friendly and willing to share more if you are looking for practical advice. I'd look into a Google + community.
